examples.title: Sample URL: http://domain/artists
examples.content:
Request Body:
{
    "name": "Mike Visser",
    "bio": "Just the Best y'all.",
    "nationality": "American",
    "birthDate": "1983-03-22T00:00:00.000Z",
    "gender": "Male"
  }

Success Response: 
{
    "_id": "5f21dbc5f11c0750d1fedd1b",
    "name": "Mike Visser",
    "bio": "Just the Best y'all.",
    "nationality": "American",
    "birthDate": "1983-03-22T00:00:00.000Z",
    "gender": "Male",
    "__v": 0
  }

Parameter.description: The database ID of the artist to delete

examples.title: Sample URL: http://domain/artists/5f21dbc5f11c0750d1fedd1b
examples.content:
Success Response: 
{
    "_id": "5f21dbc5f11c0750d1fedd1b",
    "name": "Mike Visser",
    "bio": "Just the Best y'all. No really, the best!",
    "nationality": "American",
    "birthDate": "1983-03-22T00:00:00.000Z",
    "gender": "Male",
    "wikiUrl": "",
    "UlanUrl": "",
    "__v": 0
  }

title: Show artists that match a field query.
name: searchByField

Parameter.description: The name of the field to be searched

Success 200.description: returns all matching objects in json format.

examples.title: Sample URL: http://domain/artists/nationality/American
examples.content:
Success Response: 
{
    "_id": "5f21b4df830211fe7916a251",
    "name": "Reginald Marsh",
    "bio": "American, Paris 1898–1954 Dorset, Vermont",
    "nationality": "American",
    "birthDate": "1898-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
    "deathDate": "1954-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
    "gender": "",
    "wikiUrl": "https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Q7308806",
    "UlanUrl": "http://vocab.getty.edu/page/ulan/500016727",
    "__v": 0
  },
  {
    "_id": "5f21b4df830211fe7916a250",
    "name": "Meyer Woolens, Inc.",
    "bio": "",
    "nationality": "American",
    "birthDate": null,
    "deathDate": null,
    "gender": "",
    "wikiUrl": "",
    "UlanUrl": "",
    "__v": 0
  },
  ...

Parameter.description: The name or partial name of the artist (case insensitive).

Success 200.description: returns all matching objects in json format.

examples.title: Sample URL: http://domain/artists/name/mike
examples.content:
Success Response: 
{
    "_id": "5f21dbc5f11c0750d1fedd1b",
    "name": "Mike Visser",
    "bio": "Just the Best y'all.",
    "nationality": "American",
    "birthDate": "1983-03-22T00:00:00.000Z",
    "gender": "Male",
    "wikiUrl": "",
    "UlanUrl": "",
    "__v": 0
  }

Parameter.description: The database id of the artist to update.

examples.title: Sample URL: http://domain/artist/5f21dbc5f11c0750d1fedd1b
examples.content:
Request Body:
{
"bio": "Just the Best y'all. No really, the best!"
}

Success Response: 
{
    "_id": "5f21dbc5f11c0750d1fedd1b",
    "name": "Mike Visser",
    "bio": "Just the Best y'all. No really, the best!",
    "nationality": "American",
    "birthDate": "1983-03-22T00:00:00.000Z",
    "gender": "Male",
    "wikiUrl": "",
    "UlanUrl": "",
    "__v": 0
  }

Success 200.description: will return the new object in json format.

examples.title: Sample URL: http://domain/objects
examples.content:
Request Body:
{
	"featured" : "false",
	"yearAcquired" : "2020",
	"isPublicDomain" : false,
	"primaryImageSmall" : "",
	"department" : "Paintings",
	"objectType" : "Painting",
	"title" : "Mike's Test Painting",
	"artist" : "Mike Visser",
	"dateCreated" : "1936",
	"medium" : "Finger Paints",
	"dimensions" : "18.9 x 23.7 cm (7 7/16 x 9 5/16 in.)",
	"category" : "Paintings",
	"rights" : "© Mike Visser"
    }
Success Response: 
{
	"_id" : ObjectId("5f21c8c3e096e928e1ccfd93"),
	"featured" : "false",
	"yearAcquired" : "2020",
	"isPublicDomain" : false,
	"primaryImageSmall" : "",
	"department" : "Paintings",
	"objectType" : "Painting",
	"title" : "Mike's Test Painting",
	"artist" : "Mike Visser",
	"dateCreated" : "1936",
	"medium" : "Finger Paints",
	"dimensions" : "18.9 x 23.7 cm (7 7/16 x 9 5/16 in.)",
	"category" : "Paintings",
	"rights" : "© Mike Visser",
	"__v" : 0
}

Parameter.description: The database ID of the object you are updating.

examples.title: Sample URL: http://domain/objects/5f21c8c3e096e928e1ccfd93
examples.content:
Success Response: 
{
	"_id" : ObjectId("5f21c8c3e096e928e1ccfd93"),
	"additionalImages" : [ ],

	"title" : "Mike's Test Painting",
	"culture" : "",
	"period" : "",
	"artist" : "Mike Visser",
	"dateCreated" : "1936",
	"medium" : "Mud",
	"dimensions" : "18.9 x 23.7 cm (7 7/16 x 9 5/16 in.)",
	"country" : "",

title: Show objects that match a field query.
name: searchByField

Parameter.description: The resource you would like to search within.
The option from the resource list you would like to isolate.

examples.title: Sample URL: http://domain/objects/department/Photographs
examples.content:
Success Response: 
{
    "additionalImages": [
      
    ],
    "_id": "5f21b4de830211fe7916a0d0",
    "featured": "false",
    "yearAcquired": "1997",
    "isPublicDomain": false,
    "primaryImage": "",
    "primaryImageSmall": "",
    "department": "Photographs",
    "objectType": "Photograph",
    "title": "H.W. Reitz, Architect",
    "culture": "",
    "period": "",
    "artist": "Werner Mantz",
    "dateCreated": "1927",
    "medium": "Gelatin silver print",
    "dimensions": "23.5 x 17.5 cm (9 1/4 x 6 7/8 in. )",
    "country": "",
    "category": "Photographs",
    "rights": "© 2020 Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York",
    "infoLink": "",
    "__v": 0
  },
  ...

Success 200.description: all objects with featured currently set to true

title: Show a list of all possible options for the searched field.
name: showList

Parameter.description: The resource you would like to query.

examples.title: Sample URL: http://domain/objects/department
examples.content:
Success Response: 
[
  "Egyptian Art",
  "Greek and Roman Art",
  "Drawings and Prints",
  "Modern and Contemporary Art",
  "Islamic Art",
  "Arts of Africa, Oceania, and the Americas",
  "European Sculpture and Decorative Arts",
  "The American Wing",
  "Photographs",
  "Asian Art",
  "Costume Institute",
  "Robert Lehman Collection",
  "Arms and Armor",
  "Musical Instruments",
  "Medieval Art",
  "Ancient Near Eastern Art",
  "European Paintings",
  "The Cloisters",
  "Paintings"
]

title: Show all objects currently in the public domain
name: showPublic

Success 200.description: Json objects with public set to true

Parameter.description: The database ID of the object you are updating.
